title: Reverse 1999 Tier List
description: This tier list ranks all of the Arcanists in the Reverse 1999. The list is divided into tiers from S to C, with S Tier being the best and C Tier being the worst. The tier list is based on the current meta and may change in the future.
heading: Reverse 1999 Tier List
introText: This tier list ranks all of the Arcanists in the Reverse 1999. The list is divided into tiers from S to C, with S Tier being the best and C Tier being the worst. The tier list is based on the current meta and may change in the future.

data.itemDescription: Vila is a Survival-class character dealing Mental damage. Her Ultimate purifies allies' negative statuses, and she heals passively when not acting. She also provides DMG Bonus, Sturdiness, and Critical buffs, making her strong in Mental DMG teams

Windsong is a Damage-class character dealing Mental damage. She builds up "Rehabilitation" incantations through [Preparationâ€”Windsong] stacks and casts them all at once with her Ultimate, which inflicts [Confusion] and converts excess Crit Rate into Crit DMG. She requires manual play and works best with Crit-focused supports, [Confusion] applicators, and high-rank incantation buffers

Lucy is Damage-class character from the Intellect afflatus, dealing Reality damage. She gains universal afflatus advantage with her Ultimate's [Pragmatist] status and generates [Dynamo] through Moxie, Eureka, or enemy defeats. At 20 [Dynamo], she gains [Advancement], enhancing her incantations and Ultimate. Lucy works best with allies who generate Moxie or Eureka consistently

A five-star Spirit-afflatus character, Click was a war reporter in his previous life. In the game, he serves as a mental damage dealer and debuffer, utilizing his unique abilities to weaken enemies and support his team
Provides defensive buffs, enhancing team durability
Specializes in mental damage and control effects, though her effectiveness may be limited without specific setups

A five-star Plant-afflatus character, Diggers is a versatile unit known for his control, shielding, and debuffing capabilities. He can reduce enemies' Reality and Mental defenses, inflict status effects like [Weakness] and [Nightmare], and provide shields to allies, enhancing both offensive and defensive team dynamics
